name: Photographic Memory 2.0
description: A memory match game using Instagram hashtags. Built using a Sinatra framework for the API and an all new ReactJS front end.

name: Full Roster
description: An eloquent solution to running a multi-team, multi-sport event for anyone. Built with Ruby on Rails with lots of dynamic content being loaded via Javascript.

name: Photographic Memory
description: A memory match game using Instagram hashtags. Built using a Sinatra framework and Javascript front end.

name: Rotten Mangoes
description: My first Ruby on Rails app, a Rotten Tomatoes clone. Features include Users, Admins who can ghost other users, search bar and advanced search.
